name: FreeCell Solitaire: Classic Card Game
description:
Test your wits, patience, and capacity for strategy while killing time with the hottest freecell solitaire app in town! Entertainment is literally at your fingertips!

This app features a selection of beautifully-rendered card packs and glorious backgrounds. Play this classic card game wherever you are!

The object of the game is to build up all cards on foundations from Ace to King by following suit, in ascending order. When all 52 cards are moved to their foundation piles, you win.

Features:
- Challenging, brain-tickling gameplay!
- A classic card game on your mobile device!
- Kill boredom anywhere, anytime!
- A variety of beautiful card packs
- An assortment of lovely backgrounds to choose from
- Statistics and tips to help you play better
